LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Medicine.de: The honeypot species is evolved by an internal drive, making it capable of hatching medicinal cocoons, allowing for medical abilities and the manipulation of pseudothreads, at the cost of losing the ability to produce Arachnoid nectar.\n\nThis evolutionary route does not result in the creation of honeypot species.
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Medicine.co: To release evolution, research plan/node MED-1 "healing species" is required
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Fuel.label: Honey can type conversion——flammable chamber
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Fuel.descri: Evolve the Honey Can species by internal drive, allowing them to produce chemical fuel at the cost of losing the ability to produce Arachne Honey. This increases their armor and also gives them the ability to spray fire.\n\nThis evolutionary route does not yield Arachne Bugs.
To release evolution, research project/node FEL-8 "Deflagration Cavity" is required.
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.label: Warrior species conversion—hidden slayer
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.description: Evolving warrior species through an internal drive, gaining near-permanent concealment and strong melee combat capabilities at the cost of losing the ability to use ranged weapons and special skills.\n\nThis evolutionary route does not yield succulents.
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.comps.CompAbili: To release evolution, research plan/node CLO-4 "tracking species" is required
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.label: Warrior species conversion—gene thief
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.description: Evolving a warrior species through an internal drive, gaining the ability to steal genes from enemies and transfer genes to colonists at the cost of losing combat ability and the ability to use skills.\n\nThis evolutionary route does not yield worms.
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.comps.CompAbilit: To release evolution, research plan/node STL-5 "Gene Stealing" is required.
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Production_Bacterium.label: Lost mist species conversion—Giant bacteria specialization
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Production_Bacterium.descri: The Stray Mist species is evolved by internal drive, and at the cost of losing pheromone injection ability and armor performance, it is possible to regularly produce the high-grade Arachne insect material "Activation Giant Bacteria".\n\nThis evolution route does not yield Arachne insects.
To release evolution, research plan/node BAC-1 "breeding species" is required
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.label: Lost fog species conversion——creep support
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.description: Evolve the Stray Mist type by internal drive, and at the cost of losing the ability to spray pheromones, you gain defense power, movement speed, and the ability to spread creep over a wide range and at high speed.\n\nWith this evolution route, you can obtain 6 Arachne Explosive Types of Sakai.
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.comps.CompAbilityEf: To release evolution, research plan/node CRP-3 "Creep laying" is required.
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.label: Shieldhead species conversion--nest guardian
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.description: By evolving the Shieldhead species through internal drive, you will gain stronger combat power, mobility, and assault attack capabilities at the cost of losing the ability to produce shell elements and build.\n\nWith this evolution route, you can obtain 4 Arachneic acid-type sergeants.
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.comps.CompAbili: To release evolution, research project/node VTE-1 "Guardian" is required.
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.label: Shield head type conversion--Eikensha
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.description: Evolve the Shieldhead species by internal drive, gaining stronger chitin production ability and building skills at the cost of losing defensive ability.\n\nWith this evolutionary route, you can obtain 4 Arachne-Gantognathoids.
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.comps.CompAbi: To release evolution, research plan/node CON-3 "Builder" is required
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.label: Sky Species Conversion - Lord of the Nest Bugs
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.description: By evolving the Sora Tensu species by internal drive, you will gain the ability to hatch a large number of Arachne Tensu species facilitators at the cost of reduced mobility and loss of high-altitude maneuverability.\n\nWith this evolution route, you will be able to obtain eight Arachne Tensu species facilitators.
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.comps.CompAbility: To release evolution, research plan/node LOD-6 "master of the nest" is required
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.label: Sky type conversion—electromagnetic storm
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.description: Evolving the Sky-Celestial species by internal drive, at the cost of losing mobility and high-altitude maneuverability, gains the ability to project magneto-violent Ōsukei—this Ōsugu insect releases an EMP as a suicide attack to counter the mechanoid.\n\nThis evolution route does not yield Arachne Ōsugu.
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.comps.CompAbili: To release evolution, research plan/node WID-9 "Magnetic Violence" is required.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.label: Guard species conversion——Guiding light tower
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.description: By evolving the Guard species through internal drive, you gain the ability to command aerial beast insects at the cost of losing shooting ability, jumping ability, and command ability.\n\nYou will not be able to obtain an Arachne insect with this evolution route.Please note that air beast insects will only be able to be commanded after successful takeoff—at the time you unlock this evolution path, you should not be able to build aerial beast insects yet.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.comps.CompAbili: To release evolution, research plan/node NAV-9 "Emissary" is required.
